msbt.message: On rainy days like today, it's not so bad to stay in and spend one's time enjoying the finer things, is it?
Sounds good to me.
I dunno.
I put on some soothing music and then sit down with a nice cup of tea.<10_4 /> I find it refreshing for my soul.
I like to sit back with a cup of tea and simply admire my artful interior design.<10_4 /> It's very soothing, you know.
My stretching routine changes every day, depending on the weather.
On days like today, I focus on my legs—the backs of my knees, my ankles—you know, that kind of thing. I find a good, deep stretch terribly invigorating. You must try it, darling!
When the weather is like this, I tend to focus on upper-arm stretches, . Yes, a good stretch will make your arms look extra fabulous in that favorite blouse of yours.
On days like this, I like to focus on stretching my neck.It may sound strange, but I crane my neck when I read my magazines, so it gets terribly stiff!
I like to select the perfume I wear based on the weather, you know.
For example, today I smell like , .ThoughI think the smell might be attracting bugs. They've been BUGGING me all day!
For example, I smell like today.But I smell so sweet and delicious, I've been hungry all day, !
When I can't come up with what to make for dinner, I decide based on the weather that day. Today's weather leaves me feeling like, let's see!I'm hungry already, !
I hear that changing the music in one's house to match the weather outside is all the rage. Don't tell anyone, butI usually just play my favorites over and over, .

On days when the weather is nice, taking a deep breath clears my head.And what's more, someone told me that if you breathe properly, the oxygen improves your memory. Now, if only I could remember who told me that.
Do you know what I love about rainy days? They're excellent for thinking.I find the sound of rain terribly inspiring. It makes me think the most interesting thoughts!
When it's this cold, it's hard to walk around outside.I stuffed hot packs inside my clothes, and I'm still freezing from the tip of my nose to the bottom of my toes!
Weather like today's brings back such vivid memories

Once, when I was a girl, it rained for days and days until, one morning, I woke to find it had finally stopped. Overjoyed, I ran outside to find a giant rainbow in the clear sky! So I made a wish right then and there. And I must tell you, it came true! Alas, I can't tell you what I wished for. THAT is a secret, my dear.

When I was a little girl, I took my favorite umbrella everywhere with me so I'd be ready just in case it rained. One day, a strong gust blew in and swept my umbrella up into the sky. It flew so high it disappeared! I never saw that umbrella again, but I like to think it found a new home with another little girl.

When I was young, I saw a boy I was very fond of waiting in the distance. I was SO excited I ran toward him and fell face first into a puddle! I hadn't noticed the rain or how slippery it had made the ground. My face was so bright red it could have stopped cars! Even now I get a touch embarrassed thinking of it.

It reminds of this time I went out to dinner in a blizzard. I arrived to find my date waiting outside in the cold. As I walked up to him, a pile of snow slid off the roof of the restaurant and plopped right onto his head. He just smiled and asked me if I liked his new hat.
The weather is gorgeous today, my dear! And you know what that means
Time to shop for new clothes! Sunny weather calls for a sunny wardrobe to match, !
Time for a proper picnic! We should pack up a blanket and a bit of lunch and find a spot to recline in the sun.
Time to clean the house! Days like this inspire me to beautify everything in my life.
The weather is just gorgeous today! And you know what beautiful, clear skies like these mean, don't you? Why, they mean a brilliant sky full of glittering stars tonight!
As long as this lovely weather continues, the stars should be gorgeous tonight!If I go for a walk under the starry sky, I might even see some falling stars!
My goodness, what a gorgeous rainbow!When the sky puts on such a fabulous displayit must mean something good is about to happen!
, look! A double rainbow! To say it's beautiful hardly captures it! Marvelous? Magnificent? Magical? I dare say it's all of those things and so much more!
The air is so crisp and cold today, we might get to see an aurora.Seeing those lights flash and float in the clear winter skyit's so surreal, it feels it must be a dream.
Look at how gorgeous the lights are!<10_4 /> Even in the harshest cold of winter, seeing an aurora warms the heart.
looks stunning in the morning mist, don't you think?It's as if the world has slipped into a magical realm and taken us with it.
Oh dear, listen to that thunder! Put away your golf clubs and umbrellas! And don't you dare fly a kite!

You know, they say that if you make a wish on a shooting star, your wish will come true. So, be sure to look up at the sky with .And if you see a meteor up there, press  before it disappears. I bet something wonderful will happen.
I've seen so many shooting stars that I've lost count!They're so pretty that I get mesmerized and forget to make my wishes.
My goodness, I've seen so many falling stars tonight!Over and over they appearand are gone in an instant, like fireflies chasing each other across the sky.
